definitions: convert (a production system, factory, etc.) to operation by robots

examples.text: they have used this as an opportunity to cut more jobs and robotize the assembly line

shortDefinitions: convert (production system, factory, etc.) to operation by robots

definitions: cause (a person) to become mechanical or unemotional, like a robot

examples.text: these electronic devices are robotizing humans all over the world
they are trying to robotize our children and decimate our educational system

shortDefinitions: cause person to become mechanical or unemotional
